tool_description: SiphonAI Search Result API allows users to retrieve Google search results in milliseconds, making it suitable for various applications such as marketing and SEO software.

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search and Get Results from Major Search Engines

optional_parameters.name: date_range
optional_parameters.description: Specify a date period for the results. For more details, visit: https://searchengineland.com/search-google-by-date-with-new-before-and-after-search-commands-315184

optional_parameters.name: google_domain
optional_parameters.description: Specify which Google domain to use. Available domains can be found here: https://www.google.com/supported_domains. By default, it uses google.com.
